display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (NREM): (Apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal and hypopneas with discernible flow reduction and with >= 3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal) / hour of NREM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events during NREM sleep
